data.name: sheepChat
data.detailed_description:
Simple and convinient crossplatform multichat capable to satisfy needs of any streamer. Can display messages from majority of streaming resourses and show that information like YOU want!

Chat is very easy and no additional knowledge is needed to setup the multichat. In addition you also can nicely decorate ANY notifications on regular message, either subscription or donate, etc. Drawing and polls jointly with remote control let you to increase levels of interactive communication with your viewers.


  • YouTube (& Gaming), Twitch, Mixer, GoodGame, Peka2TV, SmashCast, VKontakte, OK Live, GipsyTeam, GamersTV, CyberGame, Mobcrush, Smashcast, StreamCube, Periscope, FaceBook, Steam Broadcast, DonationAlerts, DonatePay, TwichAlerts(StreamLabs) chats support (The list is updating constantly).
  • Possibility to combination in one chat as many chats from one platform.
  • Twitch, YouTube, GoodGame notifications (the list is updating constantly).
  • Possibility to make notes in the chat during the live with only ONE move (Chat also have function to save text of your message or note).
  • Customization possibility with convinient interface of subscribers notifications system, channel support and last events.
  • 2 major modes - Regular and Gaming. Have possibility to run it over the windows (Don't work if you game in FullScreen mode).
  • Drawing and Polls systems directly in chat, also viewers can control your game (pressing buttons, running a scripts).
  • Various themes (Adding new constantly).
  • Transform text into speech locally on your computer and output it on the selected device. This feature let you not to distract from the game on the reading of the chat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Visual C++ Visual Studio 2015

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.3+, or Fedora Linux 24+
  • Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
